archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Define Additional Catalog Specification Attributes
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define, update, and remove additional attributes associated with a catalog specification.

properties.value: Define Additional Catalog Specification Attribute defines, updates, and removes additional attributes, called characteristics, using a generalized set of processes to create the attributes. This process focuses on associating/disassociating them with a catalog specification, as well as update and removal of the attributes. For example, an additional attribute may represent the media, such as web, paper, electronic, used to publish the catalog.
